name: Helga Stonebrew
title: Innkeeper
description: A stout dwarf with flour-dusted apron and a warm smile. She runs the Pickaxe & Pint with the efficiency of a mine foreman and the heart of a mother.

greeting.first_time: Aye, welcome! I'm Helga Stonebrew. Ye look like ye could use a hot meal and a cold ale! What'll it be?
greeting.returning: Back from the tunnels, are ye? Good to see ye again!
greeting.tired: Ye look beat, friend. A proper night's sleep will fix that right up.

main_menu.text: What can I do for ye?

rent_room.text: A room for the night? 40 gold gets ye a solid bed, hot breakfast, and all the ale ye can drink tonight. Ye'll sleep like a stone and wake ready for work!
rent_room.success: Room's yours! Top o' the stairs, second door. Sleep well!
rent_room.failure: Ah, ye need 40 gold for a room, friend.

buy_drink.text: Stonebrew Ale? Best in the mountains! Strong enough to put hair on yer chest. 5 gold.

ask_about_entertainment.text: We've got music most nightsâ€”drinking songs, work songs, the rowdier the better! Talk to Durin at the door if ye want to play. He's gruff, but he knows good music when he hears it!

goodbye.text: Safe travels, friend! Come back anytime!
